short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Edit JavaScript in a live editor that shows the results of running JavaScript, CSS, and HTML

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
★ JavaScript and jQuery code completion
★ On-the-fly code analysis and warnings
★ Hands-on learning environment
★ HTML DOM is refreshed automatically as you write JavaScript
